short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Raising awareness of dangerous websites as you surf across the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension will analyse the websites you visit and report to you how safe it is to use. It will provide a security rating of each website and help teach you why a website is unsafe to use.
